name: Apex (itch)
description:
Guide your minions to collect resources and battle your enemies. Consuming a resource will spawn a new minion. Predators patrol the middle and will kill you in one shot but if you can defeat them there are plentiful resources in the middle. Overrun your opponent and with your own minions to win.

Controls:

  • Player 1: WASD to move.
  • Player 2: Arrow keys to move.

Developpers:

  • Maggie McLean: Music
  • Ryan Wang: Art
  • Tanner Rogalsky: Code
